newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 3,227 to dlr for Sept 23 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 3,227 to dlr for Sept 23 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 3,227 to the dollar for September 23.
This reference rate was set on Thursday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators.
It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Wednesday for September 20 to 22 is 3,227 to the dollar. It was 3,226 on Thursday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
